content:
From: Tobias Nipkow <nipkow@in.tum.de>
A Sound and Complete Calculus for Probability Inequalities
Matthew Doty

We give a sound an complete multiple-conclusion calculus
for finitely additive probability inequalities.

https://www.isa-afp.org/entries/Probability_Inequality_Completeness.html

Enjoy!

smime.p7s
